name: Korax' Heritage: Scattered Evil
summary: Korax’ Heritage: Scattered Evil, the first game built upon the Vavoom-based KoraxRPG (KRPG) engine, is a cross-breed between a first person shooter and a role playing game, set in the world of Hexen. In addition to the 3D movement, exploration and fighting of the original Hexen, you can travel around the world in different ways and talk to non player characters (NPCs) to learn new spells, acquire new weapons, buy useful items and more. In addition, you get experience for killing monsters and finishing quests. After earning sufficient experience, you level up, gaining more power. Your deeds as well as any useful information you come upon in your travels are automatically recorded in your journal.
